title: महिषासुरमर्दिनी स्तोत्रम्
outroSubtitle: Victory to the Slayer of Mahishasura

verses.sanskrit:
अयि गिरिनन्दिनि नन्दितमेदिनि विश्वविनोदिनि नन्दिनुते।
गिरिवरविन्ध्यशिरोऽधिनिवासिनि विष्णुविलासिनि जिष्णुनुते॥
भगवति हे शितिकण्ठकुटुम्बिनि भूरिकुटुम्बिनि भूरिकृते।
जय जय हे महिषासुरमर्दिनि रम्यकपर्दिनि शैलसुते॥
verses.transliteration:
ayi girinandini nanditamedini viśvavinodini nandinute।
girivaravindhyaśiro'dhinivāsini viṣṇuvilāsini jiṣṇunute॥
bhagavati he śitikaṇṭhakuṭumbini bhūrikuṭumbini bhūrikṛte।
jaya jaya he mahiṣāsuramardini ramyakapardini śailasute॥
verses.meaning: O daughter of the mountain, who brings joy to the earth and the universe, who is praised by Lord Shiva, who resides atop the Vindhya mountain, who is the consort of Vishnu, praised by the victorious, O Goddess with the family of Shiva, possessor of a great family, who has done great deeds. Victory to You, destroyer of demon Mahishasura, beautiful one with matted locks, daughter of the mountain!

verses.sanskrit:
सुरवरवर्षिणि दुर्धरधर्षिणि दुर्मुखमर्षिणि हर्षरते।
त्रिभुवनपोषिणि शङ्करतोषिणि किल्बिषमोषिणि घोषरते॥
दनुजनिरोषिणि दितिसुतरोषिणि दुर्मदशोषिणि सिन्धुसुते।
जय जय हे महिषासुरमर्दिनि रम्यकपर्दिनि शैलसुते॥
verses.transliteration:
suravaravarṣiṇi durdharadharṣiṇi durmukhamarṣiṇi harṣarate।
tribhuvanapoṣiṇi śaṅkaratoṣiṇi kilbiṣamoṣiṇi ghoṣarate॥
danujaniroṣiṇi ditisutar oṣiṇi durmadaśoṣiṇi sindhusute।
jaya jaya he mahiṣāsuramardini ramyakapardini śailasute॥
verses.meaning: Bestower of boons to the gods, unconquerable by the wicked, who destroys evil forces and delights in joy, nourisher of the three worlds, who pleases Lord Shankara, remover of sins, who delights in praise, controller of demons, destroyer of the sons of Diti, absorber of arrogance, O daughter of the ocean. Victory to You!

verses.sanskrit:
अयि जगदम्ब मदम्ब कदम्बवनप्रियवासिनि हासरते।
शिखरि शिरोमणि तुङ्गहिमालय शृङ्गनिजालय मध्यगते॥
मधुमधुरे मधुकैटभगञ्जिनि कैटभभञ्जिनि रासरते।
जय जय हे महिषासुरमर्दिनि रम्यकपर्दिनि शैलसुते॥
verses.transliteration:
ayi jagadamba madamba kadambavanapriyavāsini hāsarate।
śikhari śiromaṇi tuṅgahimālaya śṛṅganijālaya madhyagate॥
madhumadhure madhukaiṭabhagañjini kaiṭabhabhañjini rāsarate।
jaya jaya he mahiṣāsuramardini ramyakapardini śailasute॥
verses.meaning: O Mother of the world, my Mother, who lovingly resides in the Kadamba forest and delights in laughter, adorned with the peak as Your crown, residing in the midst of the towering Himalayas, sweet as honey, destroyer of demons Madhu and Kaitabha, who delights in the cosmic dance. Victory to You!

verses.sanskrit:
अयि शतखण्ड विखण्डितरुण्ड वितुण्डितशुण्ड गजाधिपते।
रिपुगजगण्ड विदारणचण्ड पराक्रमशुण्ड मृगाधिपते॥
निजभुजदण्ड निपातितखण्ड विपातितमुण्ड भटाधिपते।
जय जय हे महिषासुरमर्दिनि रम्यकपर्दिनि शैलसुते॥
verses.transliteration:
ayi śatakhaṇḍa vikhaṇḍitaruṇḍa vituṇḍitaśuṇḍa gajādhipate।
ripugajagaṇḍa vidāraṇacaṇḍa parākramaśuṇḍa mṛgādhipate॥
nijabhujadaṇḍa nipātitakhaṇḍa vipātitamuṇḍa bhaṭādhipate।
jaya jaya he mahiṣāsuramardini ramyakapardini śailasute॥
verses.meaning: O one who shattered into hundreds of pieces the heads and trunks of enemy elephants, supreme among elephants, who with fierce valor tore apart the temples of enemy elephants, queen of the lions, whose powerful arms felled and severed the heads of warrior chiefs. Victory to You!

verses.sanskrit:
अयि रणदुर्मद शत्रुवधोदित दुर्धरनिर्जर शक्तिभृते।
चतुरविचार धुरीणमहाशिव दूतकृत प्रमथाधिपते॥
दुरितदुरीह दुराशयदुर्मति दानवदूत कृतान्तमते।
जय जय हे महिषासुरमर्दिनि रम्यकपर्दिनि शैलसुते॥
verses.transliteration:
ayi raṇadurmada śatruvadhodita durdharanirjara śaktibhṛte।
caturavicāra dhurīṇamahāśiva dūtakṛta pramathādhipate॥
duritadurīha durāśayadurmati dānavadūta kṛtāntamate।
jaya jaya he mahiṣāsuramardini ramyakapardini śailasute॥
verses.meaning: O wielder of invincible immortal power, intoxicated with battle fury to destroy enemies, O wise one skilled in strategy, chief of Lord Shiva's attendants sent as His messenger, O death to the wicked demons with evil intentions and corrupt minds. Victory to You!
